dcterms:creator: J. Larson
J. Angwin
L. Kirchner
S. Mattu
dcterms:description: The COMPAS recidivism dataset consists of defendants from Broward County in Florida between 2013 to 2014. It includes features such as sex, age, race, juvenile felony count, juvenile misdemeanor count, number of prior adult criminal offenses, severity of the crime, and the outcome of whether or not they recidivated within two years.
dcterms:title: COMPAS criminal recidivism dataset
